title.narrative: Multi-Donor Trust Fond för stöd till rättsväsendet i Serbien
Multi-Donor Trust Fund for Justice Sector Support

description.narrative: Overall objective is to facilitate Serbia’s justice sector EU integration, establish a justice sector performance framework and strengthen aid coordination in Serbia’s justice sector, by providing focused short-term support to the Ministry of Justice (MoJ) to strengthen its capacity and complete key judicial modernization analyses and actions. It supports three key development challenges for Serbia’s justice sector: strengthening judicial and prosecutorial independence, accountability and efficiency. Outcome objective 1: Improved access to justice in Serbia through more concentrated, transparent and effective legal aid programmes available to all citizens, including women, minorities and vulnerable groups in all regions. Outcome objective 2: Decisions on ICT investments in the Serbian judiciary are made strategically to maximise the effectiveness and efficiency gains and reduce the overall investment costs.
Projektet syftar till att slutföra en insats för införande av rättshjälp i Serbien, kombinerat med ökad biståndseffektivitet genom stöd via en fond där sex andra givare bidrar

Sida will join the WB multi-donor TF fund to support Serbia's justice sector EU integration and strengthen aid coordination in the sector. This project is a continuation of previous free legal aid project that was implemented through UNDP. The main focus is on improving access to justice in Serbia through more concentrated, transparent and effective legal aid programmes available to all citizens.
